lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles singer Miguel brought twists to his short set, which included numbers from his album “All I Want Is You” and “Mischief: The Mixtape.”
snippet: The Los Angeles singer Miguel brought twists to his short set, which included numbers from his album “All I Want Is You” and “Mischief: The Mixtape.”

headline.main: Artful and Abundant Cool With Dollops of Quirk
headline.seo: Miguel’s Cool and Quirky R&B at S.O.B.’s - Review
headline.print_headline: Artful and Abundant Cool With Dollops of Quirk
